DOC.brief_summary: A double-blinded randomised control trial conduct Department Obstetrics Gynaecology tertiary hospital , Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia Medical Centre ( UKMMC ) two year duration January 1st , 2012 till December 31st , 2013 . The aim study compare haemodynamic cardiovascular effect intravenous carbetocin 100 μg intravenous oxytocin 5 IU woman undergo elective Lower Segment Caesarean Section ( EL LSCS ) . Study hypothesis : A single injection carbetocin haemodynamically cardiovascularly safe similar efficacy comparison single injection oxytocin .
DOC.detailed_description: OUTCOME MEASURES systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , Heart Rate ( HR ) , saturation oxygen ( SpO2 ) certain time drug injection . The presence myocardial ischemia symptom side effect drug , ECG change ST depression change T-waves . Hemoglobin troponin-T level The need additional oxytocin infusion estimate blood loss The time interval initial drug administration , type additional oxytocic intervention use complication happen .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Viable , singleton pregnancy ≥ 37 week gestation undergo EL LSCS . 2 . Low risk postpartum hemorrhage , proven abruptio placenta , placenta previa , multiple pregnancy , preeclampsia / gestational hypertension , previous PPH , obesity ( base BMI pre pregnancy ≥ 30 kg/m2 ) , big baby . 3 . Ability provide inform consent . 1 . Emergency caesarean section 2 . Preterm Labour 3 . Grandmultipara 4 . Multiple Pregnancy 5 . Placenta Previa 6 . Previous PPH 7 . Maternal Obesity ( BMI pre pregnancy ≥ 30 kg/m2 ) ) 8 . Have comorbidity illness hypertension/preeclampsia , establish cardiac disease , history evidence liver , renal , vascular , endocrine disease bleed disorder . 9 . Contraindication carbetocin oxytocin 10 . Language Barrier 11 . Women undergo general anaesthesia 12 . Women abnormal baseline ECG suggestive myocardial ischemia
